CustomField.description: A JSON Schema (following the OpenAPI specification) that defines the input arguments this capability accepts from the LLM. This schema tells the AI what data to provide and enforces the format.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define the tool's input parameters using JSON Schema format. Include property types, descriptions, and required fields. Example: {"type":"object", "properties":{"lastName":{"type":"string", "description":"Contact's last name"}}, "required":["lastName"]}
CustomField.label: Parameters
